original_text: Lo now, his strength is in his loins, and his force is in the navel of his belly.
korean_text: 그것의 힘은 허리에 있고 그 뚝심은 배의 힘줄에 있고

sentences.original_text: Lo now, his strength is in his loins
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그의 힘은 그의 허리에 있다

sentences.original_text: and his force is in the navel of his belly
